snippet: The missionary couple had been living in Mexico since 1979, preaching and founding a Baptist church in the town of Santiago, where they lived.
abstract: Christian missionaries John and Wanda Casias from Texas are killed at their home near Monterrey, Mexico; motive for slaying is not known but area has been ravaged by drug cartels battling for control.
lead_paragraph: The missionary couple had been living in Mexico since 1979, preaching and founding a Baptist church in the town of Santiago, where they lived.
